scc.releaseInfo:
For All Platform * Updated DISA STIG SCAP content for July 2021 * Added DISA SCAP 1.3 Benchmarks for Cisco IOS-XE Routers * Fixed issues scanning certain Cisco IOS and IOS XE configuration files * Update SCC internal libxml2 dependency to version 2.9.11 * Added command line parameter to print debug to standard out (-ds or --debugToScreen)
For Windows * Updated Windows OU and Host File Creation with OU to default to no OU's selected vs all * Updated cscc.exe to return '0' as the 'successful' return code
For UNIX/Linux * Updated --setOpt, --getOpt and --listOpt to not perform a scan (configuration only parameters) on UNIX systems * Updated SCC's internal libssh2 on RHEL6 x64 and Ubuntu 16 x64 to current version 1.9.0 * Fix "Argument Too Long" Error on Solaris with ENV variable > 512 characters
For Mac OS X * Updated NIST SCAP content for Catalina and Big Sur * Updated SCC's internal libssh2 on MacOS to current version 1.9.0
